env $=$
exec vbash -log input
cmpenv stdout output

-- input --
if [ -e test ]
then
  echo "hello"
fi
# Hello world
ls > /dev/null # Again
-- output --

trap 'echo Error on linue $${OUR_LINE_NO} in $${OUR_SOURCE_FILE}' ERR

OUR_SOURCE_FILE="input"
if [ -e test ]; then
  {
    OUR_LINE_NO=3
    cat <<'THISWILLNEVERMATCH'
> echo "hello"
THISWILLNEVERMATCH
    echo "hello"
  }
fi
{
  OUR_LINE_NO=6
  cat <<'THISWILLNEVERMATCH'
> ls >/dev/null
THISWILLNEVERMATCH

  ls >/dev/null
}
